scripts.predeploy:bundle-types: pnpm run sync:types && pnpm run sync:schemas
scripts.deploy:functions: pnpm run predeploy:bundle-types && firebase deploy --only functions --project kangaroo-post
scripts.emulators:kill: pkill -f "firebase emulators" || true; pkill -f "Firestore Emulator" || true
scripts.emulators:start: pnpm run emulators:build && firebase emulators:start --project kangaroo-post --only firestore,auth,functions --import ./.emulators --export-on-exit
scripts.emulators:start:pubsub: pnpm run emulators:build && LOCAL_SAFETY_MODE=true firebase emulators:start --project kangaroo-post --only firestore,auth,functions,pubsub --import ./.emulators --export-on-exit
scripts.emulators: pnpm run emulators:kill && pnpm run emulators:start
scripts.emulators:pubsub: pnpm run emulators:kill && pnpm run emulators:start:pubsub
